subject: Get Enfamil & Gifts for Your Baby - NO Offer(s) to Participate in
body:
Get 
  Enfamil & Gifts for Your Baby - NO Offer(s) to Participate in 
The 
  Enfamil Family Beginnings (R) Program 

Here's what you get:

  *Pre and Postnatal Information and 60 Dollars in Formula Checks
  *A Diaper Bag and Samples

  *A Sippy Cup and a JC Penney Offer
The 
Enfamil Family Beginnings (R) Program

To 
  stop receiving announcements
